keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling USD $367.07 for services rendered by FedEx.
Multiple packages were sent and received by Jeffrey E. Epstein during February 2002.
Discounts totaling $11.34 were applied to the shipping charges.
The invoice includes specific details about package weights, delivery dates, and recipients.
There are several mentions of adjustments and reasons for potential invoice changes.
